doc.title: The Vanishing Dragon
doc.plot: Originally conceived as a comic book series by creator Adam DeGazon. The Vanishing Dragon evolved from characters drawn on paper to a feature film, an ambitious endeavor by creator Adam DeGazon. Written, produced and directed by Adam DeGazon, The Vanishing Dragon, heads up an ensemble cast of exciting young talent. Influenced by the film making style of George Lucas, Richard Donner, Joss Whedon and countless others along with creator Adam DeGazon's own visionary style. The Vanishing Dragon will draw audiences into a world shrouded with the mystic legends of the martial arts in a comic book style setting. The Vanishing Dragon follows the exploits of young Dragon Clan leader John Deveraux, as he sets out to discover who is trying to destroy his Dragon Clan. The young samurai finds himself drowning in a world of mystery, secrets, lies and betrayal. The fate of samurai legend rests on the shoulders of the young Clan Leader.
